result.execSummary:
The defendant Curt A. SHELSTAD was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse]. This is not a criminal offense and results only in a money penalty for this offense.

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Curt A. SHELSTAD

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
State moves to amend count 2 to Manitowoc County Ordinance 6.19, disorderly conduct.  Motion granted.   No contest plea to the amended charge.   Convicted.   State moves to dismiss and read in count 1, battery.  Motion granted.   
$20.00 forfeiture, plus costs imposed, total of $229.70, to be paid by 02-20-17 or 4 days jail.    
Minutes.
Plea date set for 12-20-2016 at 4:00 p.m., Br. 2.
Status conference set for 09-26-16 at 4:00 p.m.
Plea date on September 26, 2016 at 04:00 pm.
Notice of Hearing returned as no mail receptacle, unable to forward. Re-mailed to previous updated address.

ADDRESS INFO for Curt A. SHELSTAD
Current: 1040 River Trail Circle #1, Kiel, WI 53042 United States  (Effective: 04-08-2016)
Prior: 403 N. 1st Avenue #102, St. Nazianz, WI 54232

Settlement Conference Summary.
Plea hearing is set for 05-31-16 at 4:15 p.m.

Petition for Appointment of Counsel;  Affidavit of Indigency.
Order denying the petition because the person is not indigent.
Settlement conference on May 25, 2016 at 03:45 pm.
Plea date on May 31, 2016 at 04:15 pm.

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with District Attorney set for 04-08-16 at 11:30 a.m. Plea date set for 05-03-16 at 4:00 p.m.
Minutes.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of battery-dvo.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 02-29-16 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours of release and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.   Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
